DOC.brief_summary: To investigate mid- long-term effect Enhanced External Counterpulsation combine guideline-driven standard treatment patient document and/or high risk coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Study Enahnced External Counterpulsation Treat Coronary Heart Disease
DOC.criteria: least one coronary lesion 50 % stenosis show angiography history acute myocardial infarction ( least one month ) history prior revascularization ( Percutaneous Coronary Intervention Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting ) typical angina episode evidence myocardial ischemia Signed informed consent Obvious aortic insufficiency , aortic aneurysm , aortic dissection Coronary fistula severe coronary aneurysm Symptomatic Congestive heart failure Valvular heart disease , congenital heart disease , cardiomyopathy Cerebral hemorrhage within six month , bleed disorder identify bleeding tendency ; Lower limb infection , phlebitis , varicosity , deep venous thrombosis ; Progressive malignancy diseases poor prognosis ; uncontrolled hypertension , define SBP≥180mmHg DBP≥110mmHg
